response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering holds significant value for us at $15,000, reflecting its quality and exclusivity. Considering its worth to you stands at $8,000, I believe we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement. To ensure this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a substantial savings for you while allowing us to achieve a fair valuation for our product. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your interests and budget.", "product_price": 12000}
